system.description:
Effect: All valid targets are @Affliction[confused] 5.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Hatterene and has a Fairy-Type attack on their Active List.
